name: Privileged
description:
A game about being privileged. Some people are, and some aren't.

You control two characters: one privileged individual, and one not so privileged who works for the other.

Keep them both alive. If their needs are not satisfied, they will slowly die. To go to the next level, the needs of the privileged must be satisfied! Except, there is no next level yet :-). Also: no sound and music yet.

Controls: 

ARROW KEYS  - move character

SPACE - use object

TAB - switch character

Hint:

At the bottom of the screen, there are two health bars, red for the privileged, blue for the poor. 

Created for GGJ 20222 by Team One 

Coding by: Rick van der Meiden (kwikrick).

All assets from public domain or open source licenses. TODO: compile a list.
